author: raghushantha
body:
When trying to initialize a new instance of the PowerShell class with an empty pipeline, results in a Stackoverflowexception. Works fine on linux

Repro Steps:
On Windows Full SKU - Install PowerShell using the latest CI MSI

open PowerShell.exe
`[powershell]::Create()`

Expected:
Succeeds

Actual:
Stackoverflowexception

PackageManagement MetaProvider uses this approach to initialize PS. Hence blocking us.
